entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning and early this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High plus 1. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 29 April 2016

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
